CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Buenaventura Mining Co Inc is a mining company involved in exploring mining and processing in gold and silver. The companys operating segments are Production and sale of minerals; Exploration and development activities; Energy generation and transmission services; Insurance brokerage; Rental of mining concessions; Holding of investment in shares; and Industrial activities. The company sells metals such as Silver Gold Copper Zinc Lead and Manganese sulfate. its geographical segments are Peru America excluding Peru Europe and Asia.
